files.README.md:
# Custom Claude Skills Marketplace

A curated collection of custom plugins, agents, and tools designed for the Claude Desktop App. This repository hosts a **Marketplace** that allows you to easily install and manage specific AI skills.

## üöÄ Quick Start

To add this marketplace to your Claude Desktop environment, simply type the following command into any Claude chat window:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add beerspitnight/cc-skills
```

Once the marketplace is added, you can browse and install individual plugins using the `/plugin install` command or via the settings menu.

## üì¶ Available Plugins

| Plugin Name | Version | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Pitch Deck Creator Edtech** | `1.1.0` | specialized agent that transforms raw text into investor-ready PowerPoint & Google Slides presentations. Includes wireframing and narrative refinement. |
|| **Graphic Design Expert** | `1.0.0` | Uses design principles to create stunning images or gives suggestions on typography, color palettes, and layout. |
## üõ†Ô∏è Plugin Details

### Pitch Deck Creator Edtech (EdTech Focus)
A powerful tool for founders. It takes markdown content and runs a 7-phase design process to generate `.pptx` files.

**Prerequisites:**
*   **Node.js** (Required for PowerPoint generation)
*   Run `node -v` in your terminal to ensure it is installed.

**Installation:**
```bash
/plugin install pitch-deck-creator-edtech
```

**Usage:**
> "Create a pitch deck for my startup based on the attached `content.md` file."

## üìÇ Repository Structure

For developers or those curious about the source code, the repository is organized as follows:

```text
beerspitnight/cc-skills/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .claude-plugin/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ marketplace.json               # The Marketplace Catalog definition
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugins/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pitch-deck-creator-edtech/     # Source code for the Pitch Deck tool
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ graphic-design-expert/         # Source code for the Graphic Design tool
‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ plugin.json                # Plugin Manifest
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ skill.md                   # Agent Logic & Prompts
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                          # You are here
```

## ü§ù Contributing

Contributions are welcome! If you have a new skill idea or an improvement for an existing one:

1.  Fork this repository.
2.  Create a new folder under `plugins/` for your tool.
3.  Add a `plugin.json` manifest (ensure `strict: true`).
4.  Submit a Pull Request.

## üìÑ License

[MIT](LICENSE) ¬© Bruno

plugins.name: pitch-deck-creator-edtech
plugins.description: Transform raw text content into visually compelling, investor-ready pitch decks. Guides founders through narrative refinement, wireframing, and PowerPoint/Google Slides generation.

plugins.name: graphic-design-expert
plugins.description: Uses design principals to create stunning images or gives suggestions on typography, color palettes, and layout.

plugins.name: viral-reel-generator
plugins.description: A specialized Claude skill for engineering high-retention short-form video scripts (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts).

plugins.name: lausd-compliance-auditor-skill
plugins.description: A Claude Code skill that audits SaaS codebases against the **LAUSD IT Security Compliance Manual v2.0**, which implements the **NIST Cybersecurity Framework (CSF) 2.0.

plugins.name: business-fact-checker
plugins.description: A specialized Claude skill designed for rigorous verification of business assertions, financial metrics, valuations, and market intelligence. It moves beyond passive information retrieval to active "due_diligence" mode.

plugins.name: new-venture-analyst
plugins.description: A specialized Claude skill designed for analyzing new venture opportunities, evaluating market potential, and providing strategic insights for startup founders.
